snippet: After losing her job and trying unsuccessfully to find a new one for two years, Maria Ortiz discovered that the root of her difficulties was faulty information that had been added to her credit report.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York provides funds for Maria Ortiz of Queens to pay for books and materials needs to help prepare her for the job market.
lead_paragraph: After losing her job and trying unsuccessfully to find a new one for two years, Maria Ortiz discovered that the root of her difficulties was faulty information that had been added to her credit report.

headline.main: A Credit Nightmare, but Coming Out Better in the End
headline.print_headline: A Credit Nightmare, but Coming Out Better in the End
